00046 //Define generator - this can be global because its using convert internally
00047 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueGenerator: public ValueConverterBase
00048 {
00049 public:
00050     void create( boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00051         LOG_IF( dst.get(), Debug, warning ) <<
00052                                             "Generating into existing value " << dst->toString( true ) << " (dropping this).";
00053         Value<DST> *ref = new Value<DST>;
00054         dst.reset( ref );
00055     }
00056     boost::numeric::range_check_result generate( const ValueBase &src, boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00057         create( dst );
00058         assert( dst );
00059         const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = convert( src.castToType<SRC>(), *dst );
00060         return result;
00061     }
00062 };
00063 
00065 // general converter version -- does nothing
00067 template<bool NUMERIC, bool SAME, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00068 {
00069 public:
00070     //uncomment this to see which conversions are not generated - be carefull, thats f***king much
00071     /*  static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00072             std::cout <<
00073                 "There will be no " << (SAME?"copy":NUMERIC?"numeric":"non-numeric") <<  " conversion for " <<
00074                 util::Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << util::Value<DST>::staticName() << std::endl;
00075             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00076         }*/
00077     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00078 };
00080 // trivial version -- for conversion of the same type
00082 template<bool NUMERIC, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00083 {
00084     ValueConverter() {
00085         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00086                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << Value<SRC>::staticName();
00087     };
00088 public:
00089     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00090         ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST>;
00091         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00092     }
00093     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00094         SRC &dstVal = dst.castTo<SRC>();
00095         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00096         dstVal = srcVal;
00097         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00098     }
00099     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00100 };
00101 
00103 // Numeric version -- uses boost::numeric_cast
00105 struct NumericOverflowHandler { //@todo this is NOT thread-safe
00106     static boost::numeric::range_check_result result;
00107     void operator() ( boost::numeric::range_check_result r ) { // throw bad_numeric_conversion derived
00108         result = r;
00109     }
00110 };
00111 boost::numeric::range_check_result NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00112 
00113 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00114 {
00115     ValueConverter() {
00116         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00117                 << "Creating numeric converter from "
00118                 << Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00119     };
00120 public:
00121     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00122         ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST>;
00123         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00124     }
00125     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00126         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00127         DST, SRC,
00128            boost::numeric::conversion_traits<DST, SRC>,
00129            NumericOverflowHandler,
00130            boost::numeric::RoundEven<SRC>
00131            > converter;
00132         DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00133         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00134         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00135         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00136         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00137     }
00138     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00139 };

00142 // Conversion for complex numbers
00144 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> > : public ValueGenerator<std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> >
00145 {
00146     ValueConverter() {
00147         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Creating complex-complex converter from " << Value<std::complex<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::complex<DST> >::staticName();
00148     };
00149 public:
00150     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00151         ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> >;
00152         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00153     }
00154     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00155         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00156         std::complex<DST> , std::complex<SRC> ,
00157             boost::numeric::conversion_traits<std::complex<DST>, std::complex<SRC> >,
00158             NumericOverflowHandler,
00159             boost::numeric::RoundEven<std::complex<SRC> >
00160             > converter;
00161         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00162         const std::complex<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<std::complex<SRC> >();
00163         std::complex<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::complex<DST> >();
00164 
00165         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00166         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00167     }
00168     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00169 };

00172 // Conversion for "normal" to complex numbers -- uses ValueConverter on the real part
00174 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> > : public ValueGenerator<SRC, std::complex<DST> >
00175 {
00176     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00177     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00178         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00179                 << "Creating number-complex converter from "
00180                 << Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::complex<DST> >::staticName();
00181     };
00182 public:
00183     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00184         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00185         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00186         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00187             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00188 
00189         if ( elem_conv ) { // if there is a conversion from SRC to DST create a conversion SRC => complex<DST> using that
00190             ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> >( elem_conv );
00191             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00192         } else {
00193             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00194         }
00195     }
00196     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00197         std::complex<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::complex<DST> >();
00198         Value<DST> real;
00199         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = m_conv->convert( src, real );
00200 
00201         if( ret == boost::numeric::cInRange )
00202             dstVal = std::complex<DST>( ( DST )real, DST() );
00203 
00204         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00205     }
00206     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00207 };

00211 // vector4 version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00213 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >
00214 {
00215     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00216     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00217         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00218                 << "Creating vector converter from "
00219                 << Value<vector4<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00220     };
00221 public:
00222     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00223         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00224         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00225         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00226             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00227 
00228         if ( elem_conv ) {
00229             ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >( elem_conv );
00230             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00231         } else {
00232             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00233         }
00234     }
00235     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00236         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00237         const vector4<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<vector4<SRC> >();
00238         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00239 
00240         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00241             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00242             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( srcVal[i] ), elem_dst );
00243 
00244             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00245                 ret = result;
00246 
00247             dstVal[i] = ( DST )elem_dst;
00248         }
00249 
00250         return ret;
00251     }
00252     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00253 };
00254 
00256 // list version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00258 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >
00259 {
00260     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00261     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00262         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00263                 << "Creating list converter from "
00264                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00265     };
00266 public:
00267     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00268         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00269         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00270         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00271             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00272 
00273         if ( elem_conv ) {
00274             ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >( elem_conv );
00275             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00276         } else {
00277             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00278         }
00279     }
00280     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00281         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00282         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00283                 << "Storing into non empty list while conversion from "
00284                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00285         const std::list<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<std::list<SRC> >();
00286         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00287 
00288         for ( typename std::list<SRC>::const_iterator i = srcVal.begin(); i != srcVal.end(); i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00289             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00290             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( *i ), elem_dst );
00291 
00292             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00293                 ret = result;
00294 
00295             dstVal.push_back( ( DST )elem_dst );
00296         }
00297 
00298         return ret;
00299     }
00300     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00301 };

00305 // string version -- uses lexical_cast to convert from/to string
00307 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, DST>
00308 {
00309     ValueConverter() {
00310         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00311                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00312     };
00313 public:
00314     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00315         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST>;
00316         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00317     }
00318     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00319         DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00320         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00321         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<DST>( srcVal );
00322         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00323     }
00324     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00325 };

00366 // special version to convert from string to a given selection
00367 // (lexical_cast doesnt work here, because it creates a temporary buffer)
00369 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, Selection>
00370 {
00371     ValueConverter() {
00372         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00373                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<Selection>::staticName();
00374     };
00375 public:
00376     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00377         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection>;
00378         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00379     }
00380     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00381         Selection &dstVal = dst.castTo<Selection>();
00382         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00383 
00384         if ( dstVal.set( srcVal.c_str() ) )
00385             return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00386         else
00387             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow; //if the string is not "part" of the selection we count this as positive overflow
00388     }
00389     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00390 };

00394 // string/bool version -- uses decision based on text
00396 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, bool>
00397 {
00398     ValueConverter() {
00399         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00400                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00401     };
00402 public:
00403     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00404         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool>;
00405         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00406     }
00407     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00408         bool &dstVal = dst.castTo<bool>();
00409         const std::string srcVal = boost::algorithm::to_lower_copy<std::string>( src.castTo<std::string>() );
00410 
00411         if (  srcVal == "true" || srcVal == "y" || srcVal == "yes" ) {
00412             dstVal = true;
00413         } else if ( srcVal == "false" || srcVal == "n" || srcVal == "no" ) {
00414             dstVal = false;
00415         } else {
00416             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << src.toString( true ) << " is ambiguous while converting to " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00417             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow;
00418         }
00419 
00420         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00421     }
00422     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00423 };
00424 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> : public ValueGenerator<bool, std::string>
00425 {
00426     ValueConverter() {
00427         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00428                 << "Creating special to-string converter for " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00429     };
00430 public:
00431     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00432         ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, bool, std::string>;
00433         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00434     }
00435     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00436         std::string &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::string>();
00437         const bool &srcVal = src.castTo<bool>();
00438         dstVal = srcVal ? "true" : "false";
00439         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00440     }
00441     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00442 };

00446 // string => list/vector version -- uses util::stringToList
00448 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, std::list<DST> >  //string => list
00449 {
00450     ValueConverter() {
00451         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00452                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00453     };
00454 public:
00455     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00456         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >;
00457         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00458     }
00459     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00460         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00461         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00462                 << "Conversion from " << Value<std::string>::staticName()
00463                 << " into non empty list  " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName()
00464                 << " previous content will be lost";
00465         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00466         const std::list<DST> buff = util::stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00467         dstVal.assign( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00468         return boost::numeric::cInRange;  //@todo handle bad casts
00469     }
00470     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00471 };
00472 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, vector4<DST> >  //string => vector4
00473 {
00474     ValueConverter() {
00475         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00476                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00477     };
00478 public:
00479     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00480         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >;
00481         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00482     }
00483     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00484         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00485         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00486         const std::list<DST> buff = stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00487         dstVal.copyFrom( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00488         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00489     }
00490     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00491 };

00507 //OK, thats about the foreplay. Now we get to the dirty stuff.
00509 
00511 template<typename SRC> struct inner_TypeConverter {
00512     std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &m_subMap;
00513     inner_TypeConverter( std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &subMap ): m_subMap( subMap ) {}
00514     template<typename DST> void operator()( DST ) { //will be called by the mpl::for_each in outer_TypeConverter for any DST out of "types"
00515         //create a converter based on the type traits and the types of SRC and DST
00516         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00517         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00518         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> conv =
00519             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00520         //and insert it into the to-conversion-map of SRC
00521         m_subMap.insert( m_subMap.end(), std::make_pair( Value<DST>::staticID, conv ) );
00522     }
00523 };
00524 
00526 struct outer_TypeConverter {
00527     std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &m_map;
00528     outer_TypeConverter( std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &map ): m_map( map ) {}
00529     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each in ValueConverterMap() for any SRC out of "types"
00530         boost::mpl::for_each<types>( // create a functor for from-SRC-conversion and call its ()-operator for any DST out of "types"
00531             inner_TypeConverter<SRC>( m_map[Value<SRC>().getTypeID()] )
00532         );
00533     }
00534 };
00536 
00537 ValueConverterMap::ValueConverterMap()
00538 {
00539     boost::mpl::for_each<types>( outer_TypeConverter( *this ) );
00540     LOG( Debug, info ) << "conversion map for " << size() << " types created";
00541 }
00542 
00543 }
00544 }
00545 }
